# Types

> Standard library types.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var types = require( '@stdlib/types' );
```

#### types

Standard library types.

``` javascript
var o = types;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

## Examples

``` javascript
var getKeys = require( 'object-keys' ).shim();

console.log( getKeys( ns ) );
```
